name: Roo.data.HttpProxy
desc:
An implementation of {@link Roo.data.DataProxy} that reads a data object from an {@link Roo.data.Connection} object configured to reference a certain URL.

Note that this class cannot be used to retrieve data from a domain other than the domain from which the running page was served.

For cross-domain access to remote data, use an {@link Roo.data.ScriptTagProxy}.

Be aware that to enable the browser to parse an XML document, the server must set the Content-Type header in the HTTP response to "text/xml".

config.name: method
config.desc: (Optional) The default HTTP method to be used for requests. (defaults to undefined; if not set but parms are present will use POST, otherwise GET)

config.name: timeout
config.desc: (Optional) The timeout in milliseconds to be used for requests. (defaults to 30000)

config.name: autoAbort
config.desc: (Optional) Whether this request should abort any pending requests. (defaults to false)

config.name: url
config.desc: (Optional) The default URL to be used for requests to the server. (defaults to undefined)

config.name: extraParams
config.desc:
(Optional) An object containing properties which are used as
extra parameters to each request made by this object. (defaults to undefined)

config.name: disableCaching
config.desc: (Optional) True to add a unique cache-buster param to GET requests. (defaults to true)

config.name: defaultHeaders
config.desc:
(Optional) An object containing request headers which are added
 to each request made by this object. (defaults to undefined)

methods.name: getConnection
methods.desc: Return the {@link Roo.data.Connection} object being used by this Proxy.

methods.name: load
methods.desc:
Load data from the configured {@link Roo.data.Connection}, read the data object into
a block of Roo.data.Records using the passed {@link Roo.data.DataReader} implementation, and
process that block using the passed callback.

params.name: params
params.desc:
An object containing properties which are to be used as HTTP parameters
for the request to the remote server.

params.name: reader
params.desc:
The Reader object which converts the data
object into a block of Roo.data.Records.

params.name: callback
params.desc:
The function into which to pass the block of Roo.data.Records. The function must be passed
  • The Record block object
  • The "arg" argument from the load function
  • A boolean success indicator

params.name: scope
params.desc: The scope in which to call the callback

params.name: arg
params.desc: An optional argument which is passed to the callback as its second parameter.

events.name: *load
events.desc: Fires before the load method's callback is called.

params.name: arg
params.desc: The callback argument object passed to the load function.

events.name: *beforeload
events.desc: Fires before a network request is made to retrieve a data object.

params.name: params
params.desc: The params parameter to the load function.

events.name: *loadexception
events.desc: Fires if an Exception occurs during data retrieval.

params.name: arg
params.desc: The callback argument object passed to the load function.
